ca_p_ratio.notes: Per-meal target; increase during breeding; dust insects if insects used.

vitamin_d3.notes: UVB is required for D3 synthesis; dietary D3 alone is often insufficient without UVB exposure.

bearded_dragon.feeding_notes: Gut-load insects and dust with calcium + D3 for insect meals; prefer vegs with high Ca:P for herbivorous meals.

iguana.feeding_notes: Primarily herbivorous; high-fiber greens and variety; avoid high-oxalate plants.

vitamin_c_mg_per_day.notes: Supply via fortified pellets or fresh veg; avoid relying on water supplements.

ca_p_ratio.notes: Calcium absorption is high; use timothy hay for adults; avoid alfalfa as main forage.

rabbit.notes: Hay-based diet; pellets only as supplement; dental health driven by forage.

parrot_general.calcium_notes: Egg-laying species need higher calcium; dusting and mineral blocks recommended in breeders; captive parrot requirements vary by species.
parrot_general.vitamin_a_notes: Vitamin A is species specific; wild-fruit/veg patterns guide supplementation.

budgie.notes: Seed-only diets are inadequate; pellet + fresh veg strongly recommended.
